entry.title: Monday: Clear. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Near blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Near blizzard developing early this evening and ending after midnight. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
